features: Automatically senses, captures, and traps pollutants for cleaner air..number_of_speeds : 10
Detects and destroys formaldehyde released from household items.
Fully sealed to HEPA H13 standard. The HEPA filter captures 99.97 percent of particles 0.3 microns in size. An additional filter removes odors and gases including VOCs.
Air Multiplier technology generates the circulation power to draw distant pollutants into the machine, projecting purified air throughout the whole room.
Automatically senses and reacts to changes in air quality, then reports pollution in real time on LCD screen and on the MyDyson app.
Choose between Fan mode for direct cooling with your choice of 0 to 350 degree oscillation and Backwards airflow mode to purify without cooling.
The filter is quick and easy to change. With automatic filter-life notifications on the LCD screen or MyDyson app.
Program your machine to turn off after pre-set intervals between 30 minutes and 8 hours.
In Night mode, the machine monitors and purifies using the quietest settings with a dimmed display.
Control and monitor your air quality from anywhere using the MyDyson app.
body.description: The Dyson HEPA Cool Formaldehyde™ is engineered with Dyson's most advanced filtration system that combines a precise, solid-state formaldehyde sensor with a unique catalytic filter that continuously destroys formaldehyde.¹ Powerful Air Multiplier™ technology purifies air throughout the whole room.**In maximum setting. Tested for air projection (DTM801) and purification coverage in a 2860ft3 room (TM-003711)¹Third party full machine testing based on GB/T 18801-2018 formaldehyde cumulative clean mass testing with continuous injection until plateau of formaldeyde CADR is achieved. Results may vary in practice.²Requires device to run app, Wi-Fi or mobile data, Bluetooth 4.0 support, and iOS version 10 or Android version 5 (or above). Standard data and messaging rates may apply.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Poor air quality isn't just a problem outside​ It’s a problem inside too. Household items release pollutants that can get trapped in our homes. That's why Dyson purifiers automatically sense and remove them.​ Powerful circulation to purify the whole room*​ Dyson purifiers are engineered with Air Multiplier technology to draw in distant pollutants and project purified air throughout the room.*

Fully sealed to HEPA H13 standard​ To prevent pollutants from leaking back into the air, the whole purifier is sealed to HEPA 13 standard, not just the filter. So what goes inside, stays inside.​ Captures gases and ultrafine particles​ The HEPA filter captures 99.97% of particles 0.3 microns in size. An additional filter removes odors and gases including VOCs.​ Destroys formaldehyde continuously³​ The Dyson catalytic filter continuously traps and breaks down formaldehyde molecules into water and CO₂.¹ And it never needs replacing.​ Senses and reports automatically​ Integrated sensors constantly analyze your air, while our unique algorithm cross-checks data every second. It diagnoses pollutants at a molecular level, displaying live results on the LCD.​
Backwards airflow mode​ Diverts airflow through the back of the machine to purify the room without cooling you​. Night mode​ Monitor and purifies using the quietest settings with a dimmed display​.

Easy filter care​ Changing the HEPA+ Carbon filter is quick and easy, with automatic notifications on the LCD screen and MyDyson app.² The catalytic filter never needs replacing.​ Intelligent control​ Control and monitor your air quality from anywhere using the MyDyson app.²

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for off gassing furniture
reviews.reviewText: I owned HEPA filters already, however after buying some new furniture in my son’s room, the off-gassing was terrible. Even after letting the pieces air out for days, they still were stinky.. so I caved on this Dyson during prime days. The app breaks down different types of crud sensed in your air and graphs it, plus the machine is intuitive to use. The air flow even gets really strong while remaining quiet; this is my quietest filter unit! I love it but not enough to replace all my existing HEPA filters for the price tag; it was necessary for reducing formadehyde furniture off gassing and has done a good job at it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Found this as a supplement to the existing Dyson unit in my house. Got this at a great deal during the prime days. It cost less than my prior unit and is remated to remove more from the air.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Amazon Prime Day Purchase Ever
reviews.reviewText: I've been eye-ing this product for awhile and I'm SO glad I purchased it during Amazon Prime Day Sale. Biggest concern I had was the high-pitched noise that everyone was complaining about. I had a $40 fan in my room before this and honestly, Dyson's "high pitched noise" is nothing compared to the cheap fan noise I had before.Filter is SO easy to put in, mobile app is so nice to have, and the little display on the fan itself showing different levels of particles, NO2, HCHO, etc is really nice too! I honestly didn't think I'd need Formaldehyde filtering but to my surprise, my room had high levels of it!I HIGHLY recommend this to anyone who has limited space and can't have both a fan and an air purifier in the room without losing floor space. Personally, fan function works good enough to cool me down at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love its features, but a little loud.
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is awesome. It tells you the rating for air quality on the machine itself which is helpful. The app that you can connect is a lot more useful with easy directional control, air speed, and different air quality readings. Pretty expensive and highly recommend buy on sale.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love everything about this
reviews.reviewText: This unit is expensive, but the accuracy and control are worth it to me. We bought a different Dyson model for a family member, loved it upon testing, so got this one. We had always feared that our apartment was not properly maintained, and this product set the record straight. this is very quite and makes a very nice fan on hot days as well. All the settings you could want for comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how it purifies the air. I made a mistake and got the one that is only a fan and purifier. Plan on getting the one that is heater, fan and purifier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars High pitched noise after 1 month of use
reviews.reviewText: I had seen the reviews talking about a high pitched noise that people were experiencing with their units. This initially made me hesitant to purchase this unit. However, I saw Dyson's responses somewhere talking about how lifting the unit by the upper loop part is what causes this issue to start happening. I thought that I'd try buying one of these and make sure not to lift it by the upper fan part. First of all, it's super awkward to lift and move this unit by the base since there is nothing to grab on to. Most importantly, not lifting by the upper fan part and only lifting by the base didn't matter at all! The unit started making the dreaded high pitch noise everyone is talking about within a month of use on the 'auto' setting. Don't take the chance on buying this unit like I did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best fan out there
reviews.reviewText: Bought this when it was on sale and I’m so glad I did. I does exactly what a fan is supposed to do and is super quiet too. Easy to set up as well. Would definitely buy again!
